item.description:
FASTER, DEEPER, HIGHER, STEEPER

- The Banff Mountain Film Festival hits the Seacoast on February 13th, 2013!

This Festival is a unique, exhilarating and provocative exploration of the mountain world. Films explore Mountain life, remote and breathtaking environments and heart-pounding adventure. The Festival is a program of The Banff Center and is the largest, and one of the most prestigious, mountain festivals in the world. With stops planned in about 390 communities and 35 countries across the globe, this is the only Seacoast stop of the tour and it is the largest fundraiser of the year for Goodwin Community Health.

From approximately 300 films entered into the annual festival in Banff, Canada the best-of-the-best are chosen for this show. Through these films, attendees travel to exotic landscapes and remote cultures and get up-close and personal with adrenaline-packed action sports.

Join Goodwin Community Health when the Banff Mountain Film Festival World Tour brings the spirit of outdoor adventure to the Seacoast, at the Music Hall in Portsmouth, NH on February 13, 2013.

General Admission $25

When you have purchased your ticket, please write "I'm in" as a comment when you RSVP so I know who's actually going. We'll plan to meet at Flatbreads at 5:30 for dinner before the show. If you're joining us please comment in "I'm in for it all!".

THIS SHOW WILL BE SOLD OUT!!! To buy tickets in advance:

http://www.themusichall.org/calendar/event/banff_mountain_film_festival_world_tour

Meetup in the Music Hall reception area 6:30 - 6:45 PM   ~ Look for a Meetup sign ~

Dana's Cell: (603) 759-9876
item.how_to_find_us: Meetup in the Music Hall reception area 6:30 - 6:45 PM ~ Look for a Meetup sign ~ Contact #(603)759-9876

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group
